item.title: The Natal Papers
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book The Natal papers. A reprint of all notices and public documents connected with that territory including a description of the country and a history of events from 1498 to 1843 in two part by John Centlivres Chase. Facsimile reprint. Cape Town, C. Struik (PTY) LTD 1968.]
